amendment.description: An amendment numbered 102 printed in Part A of House Report 118-261 to prohibit funds from implementing certain Executive Orders relating to environmental justice.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McCormick amendment (A053) Agreed to by recorded vote: 217 - 202 (Roll no. 585).

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the McCormick amendment (A053) Agreed to by recorded vote: 217 - 202 (Roll no. 585).
